search_results.title: Karim R. Lakhani's Bio
search_results.snippet: Karim R. Lakhani is the Charles E. Wilson Professor of Business Administration and the Dorothy and Michael Hintze Fellow at the Harvard Business School.

search_results.title: Home Default | Dr. Karim R. Ellis
search_results.snippet: Dr. Karim R. Ellis is the #1 Breakthrough Strategist and has been featured in NBC, CBS, ABC, Yahoo! Finance, Wall Street Select, and FOX network affiliates ...

search_results.title: Karim Mattar | English
search_results.snippet: Karim Mattar is an Associate Professor of English at the University of Colorado at Boulder. A descendant of survivors of the Palestinian Nakba of 1948.
